overview: Autumn Falls breaks her mother's favorite vase, but her stepdad says he'll take the blame if Autumn does something for him. Chloe Temple was massaging her stepdad's sore leg when she noticed him get hard. Now she's massaging his 3rd leg! Kendra Spade was showering when she catches her stepbrother creeping on her. Abella Danger gets some really bad news and the only thing that can make her feel better is stepdad dick!
tagline: A stepfather's punishment is just what Autumn wanted.
title: Twisted Family Secrets 4
